Package goal.tools.debugger

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Debugger  
    DebugObserver
    Observer of a SteppingDebugger.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BreakPoint
    stores information about a breakpoint that was placed in the code manually by the user.
    DebugEvent
    Stores information about a (debug) event.
    DebugSettingSynchronizer
    This listener listens to the debug settings in the Preferences and copies the pause settings to the agent's debugger.
    LoggingObserver
    This is a default observer for Debugger that forwards breakpoint hit info to the InfoLog.
    NOPDebugger  
    ObservableDebugger  
    SteppingDebugger
    Provides two functions: Provides control over the run mode of an agent.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BreakPoint.Type  
    Channel
    Represents different event channels to which debug observers can subscribe.
    Channel.ChannelState
    The state of a Channel.
    SteppingDebugger.RunMode
    Possible run modes of the debugger.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DebuggerKilledException
    DOC what is this exception ? It makes no sense to kill a debugger as a debugger is a utility class for an agent?
